TopicTitle: The Venture Mission: a near-failure Laythe landing and return

Articles.Content:
Convinced that a voyage to Laythe wouldn't be much harder than Duna, I set about building a giant interplanetary hauler to send it there. Unfortunately... several design oversights compounded to put the mission in jeopardy. It ended up being an... eventful mission.
